message.body: Happy EDD! Hope your last day at work goes well. How are you feeling today? Talk soon.
Feeling good, same. BPP weds if I'm still pregnant. Belly itching is PUPPS dr says. Two more hours of work left, tough to hand it all over, but it will be a relief too.
Thanks for the update. Makes sense about work but you have made it almost the whole way. Well done. Good to know about rash. Was at a birth at Mt. Sinai
the other night, loved it. Going to be great! Talk soon.
